metadata.name: You are my only one
metadata.description:
1/1 Original Art by Sepimnft , 4000*5000 , 5,6 mb , jpg file 
This Art is inspired by Poem by Rumi that is written in Persian in this painting: ‎
من زخم تورا به هیچ مرهم ندهم ٬یکی موی تو را بهر دو عالم ندهم 
The interpretation of this poem from my point of view in English is : No one can replace yr love in my heart & my soul , you will always be my one and only love
